title: Augmented Reality-Based Clinical Skills Microlearning Program

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary nursing knowledge and experience with basic patient care skills
context.additional_context: A course for learning augmented reality content in mobile environments to acquire skills immediately applicable in medical settings

learning_goals: Learners can perform blood pressure measurement and intravenous injection techniques with 90% accuracy through AR simulations
Learners can access AR content via mobile devices to establish and execute self-directed learning plans.
Learners can integrate and apply clinical skills across patient scenarios through team-based project assessments.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
